archimate:Device.name: Ruggedized Maintenance Tablet (RMTABS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Facilities management, maintenance staff, security teams, and environmental services • Asset tracking, work-order management, preventive maintenance checklists, security patrol logs, reporting incidents, viewing technical documentation, accessing building plans.
Specifications:
• Processor Type: o Mid-range ARM-based processor (e.g., Qualcomm Snapdragon 700-series) or Intel Core/i5 (rugged tablet optimized variant) • Memory Capacity: o 8 GB RAM (efficient multitasking for maintenance apps and document access) • Storage Capacity: o 256 GB SSD or internal flash storage (expandable via microSD card if needed) • Display Size and Resolution: o 11 inches, Full HD (1920x1080) or equivalent o Ultra-bright, sunlight-readable screen with anti-glare coating for outdoor visibility • Battery Life: o Minimum 10–12 hours continuous use per charge o Hot-swappable battery system (), ensuring uninterrupted shifts • Operating System: o Windows 11 Pro Enterprise OS (depending on departmental software compatibility) • Connectivity Options: o Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points), Bluetooth 5.1, integrated 4G LTE for mobile data (field use), GPS capability for asset and personnel tracking • Weight and Dimensions: o Lightweight but rugged build, under 2.5 lbs o Compact size (approx. 11"x8"x0.6") for portability during on-site tasks • Input Options: o Responsive touchscreen (glove-friendly, multi-touch capability) o Stylus input support for precise documentation and digital signatures o detachable rugged keyboard for extended data entry • Camera Specifications: o Front-facing camera: minimum 5 MP (video conferencing, security verification) o Rear camera: minimum 8 MP with autofocus and flash (photographing maintenance issues, asset condition, incident documentation) • Durability and Protective Equipment: o Ruggedized chassis rated IP65+ (dustproof, waterproof) o MIL-STD-810G compliant for shock, vibration, and drop-resistance (withstands drops up to 6 ft onto concrete) o Reinforced corners and edges, impact-resistant screen protector, dust covers for ports o Case with stand • Security Features: o Integrated TPM 2.0 security module o Biometric (fingerprint) or RFID/NFC authentication for secure device access o Remote management, tracking, and secure data wiping capability
